citation.case_name: Bostic v. GRAY EX REL. ALEXANDER

html_lawbox:
127 S.Ct. 2428 (2007)

Antonio BOSTIC, Individually and In His Official Capacity as Deputy Sheriff for Tuscaloosa County, Alabama, petitioner,
v.
Laquarius GRAY, a Minor, By and Through Her Mother and Next Friend, Toniko L. ALEXANDER.

No. 06-895.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 21, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
